summary: (1) EVENTS LEADING UP TO THE FAILURE        - NONE, CAR WAS DRIVEN UNDER NORMAL DRIVING CONDITIONS ON PAVED ROADS AND HIGHWAYS  (2) FAILURE AND ITS CONSEQUENCES        - ACCORDING TO A DEALER, DEBRIS (PERHAPS A ROCK OR PEBBLE) FLEW PAST THE GRILL AND PUNCTURED THE AC CONDENSER, CAUSING A LEAK. CONSEQUENTLY, THE AIR CONDITIONER NO LONGER BLOWS COLD AND WILL COST APPROXIMATELY $800 TO REPAIR.  (3) WHAT WAS DONE TO CORRECT THE FAILURE        - NO ACTION HAS HERETOFORE BEEN TAKEN.  *TR
